entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
